TopicTitle: Petition: Get Xacktar to be a part of the media group

Articles.Content:
The media group is a group of people who make KSP videos and are affiliated somewhat with Squad. As far as I know this includes:

HOC Gaming

LeGoldfish

OperationDX

WhiteOwl

Scott Manley

Streetlamp Production

Danny2462

EnterElysium

Pleborean

Nassault (now he's technically with Squad now, right?)

These people generally get the next update of KSP a bit early to make videos about it. Which brings me to Xacktar. Xacktar's videos are as good if not better than Danny2462's videos, and his content extends past just videos. His Kerbals all have individual personalities, for instance.

Edited June 27, 2014 by GregroxMun
I think you should at least post some links to his videos. links to your fav moments in his videos, etc...

O.O

Me?

*Reads again*

Oh, 'Xactar'

Whew. Thought you were talking about me for a second.

Giving me media access would be disastrous... probably.

O.O

Me?

*Reads again*

Oh, 'Xactar'

Whew. Thought you were talking about me for a second.

Giving me media access would be disastrous... probably.

He misspelled It... Most likely.

He does say " Which brings me to Xactar. Xactar's videos are as good if not better than Danny2462's videos, and his content extends past just videos."

He is most likely talking to you.

I don't know what any of you are talking about. I spelled it perfectly the first try. Totally. Don't even look at any names on the poll, because I promise it was spelled correctly in the first place. No. Stop. DON'T look at ANY NAMES in the poll! STOP! NOOOO!
What happened to Robbaz? That guy is a genius!

I never noticed that you can see who voted for what if you check the results early enough. Sort of makes me not want to vote negatively about someone in a poll like this (not Zacktar specifically, I don't watch much in the way of KSP youtube so I don't know if he's better or worse than the others).

I will give rep to whoever spells Xacktar wrong the best.
Zayackataer

I will give rep to whoever spells Xacktar wrong the best.

Xerkturt

(Wait, is it unfair for me to do this? Eh, probably!)
Maybe link to some of those videos to better advocate for your position?

Xerkturt

(Wait, is it unfair for me to do this? Eh, probably!)

Yes, because we KNOW it's actually 'Psacktaur'

It just ain't right without a PS at the beginning.....

I will give rep to whoever spells Xacktar wrong the best.

Kacktar.

That sounds kind of dirty actually.
What happened to KurtJMac's involvement with the game?

What happened to KurtJMac's involvement with the game?

He stopped playing.

Less flippantly, I think he's more of a "play a lot of games a little bit" kind of guy and KSP requires more of a time and effort commitment than he's got or is willing to give. Which is sad because I enjoy his videos even though - now that I'm better at the game - they frequently make me cringe.

I do quite like your videos, Mr Czak-tuhr.

But it's up to Sqaud, if the have a vacansy, and yourself, if you want it.

Best Xacktar misspelling.

Pshyaklaytaier

He stopped playing.

Less flippantly, I think he's more of a "play a lot of games a little bit" kind of guy and KSP requires more of a time and effort commitment than he's got or is willing to give. Which is sad because I enjoy his videos even though - now that I'm better at the game - they frequently make me cringe.

Wait... Wat? *looks at latest Kurtjmac videos* (Worried voice:) Well... Maybe, He is waiting for the next update?....

Wait... Wat? *looks at latest Kurtjmac videos* (Worried voice:) Well... Maybe, He is waiting for the next update?....

Don't get me wrong, I like a lot of his videos (Next Car Game is always a hoot, as is ... the other driving game he plays that's not an F1 simulator. With huge open worlds where you just drive off cliffs and stuff) and keep checking his channel every once in a while (I'm giving his Spintires series a try right now but it's totally not making me want to play the game), but as far as KSP youtubers go, he's simply not one any more.

I collaborated with Xacktar once and that video is the most viewed on my Youtube channel, he said to me: "Work with me and we will re-become the greatness we never weren't". Then exploded. I still don't get it. Genius.

Vote Xacktar!... alright, where is my money?... wait... is this thing still on?... how do I shut it of*crackling sounds, static*

Edited June 27, 2014 by Wooks
I fully support this petition! Go Exact-ear!

Which is sad because I enjoy his videos even though - now that I'm better at the game - they frequently make me cringe.

Yeah, I was just catching up on his stuff, cringing at least every 5 minutes :-) It's still worth watching, at least.

Don't get me wrong, I like a lot of his videos (Next Car Game is always a hoot, as is ... the other driving game he plays that's not an F1 simulator. With huge open worlds where you just drive off cliffs and stuff) and keep checking his channel every once in a while (I'm giving his Spintires series a try right now but it's totally not making me want to play the game), but as far as KSP youtubers go, he's simply not one any more.

Yup, sad, he was the first youtuber I ever saw do KSP and what brought KSP to my attention (and boy did I ever kick myself for not finding it sooner), but he managed to youtube ONE trip to the Mun during 0.21 (to be honest, it was three launches, due to all the refueling).

On topic, I'll watch some of Xacktar's videos before voting.
